text: Alfred Edward Newton was an Australian lawn bowls international who competed in the 1950 British Empire Games. ==Bowls career== At the 1950 British Empire Games he won the silver medal in the singles event. He was the 1952 Australian National Bowls Championships singles winner, bowling for the City Bowls Club in New South Wales. ==References== Category:Australian male bowls players Category:Bowls players at the 1950 British Empire Games Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for Australia Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls Category:Possibly living people
title: Albert Newton (bowls)
